events.name: STAR WARS | Bowcaster Making for Children: Wookiee Weekend
events.description:
LIMITED KITS. Gggrrrrr.. To fellow Chewbacca lovers out there, you can now make your own Bowcaster â™¥ Click 'Interested' to stay updated. PM us to learn more and secure your Bowcaster. First come, first served.

Join us at Flashbang Singapore near Somerset MRT this weekend and experience shooting like a Wookie (a less hairy one). Learn basic woodworking, carpentry skills and projectile science as you construct your very own Bowcaster :)

Recommended for children aged 7 years and above. Youth and adult learners are welcomed. No prior experience needed.

Venue: Grange Road Car Park
(Between 313 Somerset & H&M)
Nearest MRT: Somerset MRT
Booth: Level 2 near Staircase

Each session is about 60 minutes. Drop us a PM or comment below to find out more and to schedule your timeslot. First come, first served.

Kindly contact us at 93630528 for further details.
